text: Ara tini'i se'ijana yini prthibike bistrta karechena, ara tate sthapana karechena parbatamala o nadanadi. Ara pratyeka phalera ksetre -- tara madhye tini srsti karechena joraya-joraya duti-duti. Tini ratrike diye dinake abrta karena. Nihsandeha ete saksat nidarsana rayeche se'i lokadera jan'ya yara cinta kare.
